verses.verse: And it came to pass in the fourth <WH702> year <WH8141> of king <WH4428> Darius <WH1867>, that the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto Zechariah <WH2148> in the fourth <WH702> day of the ninth <WH8671> month <WH2320>, even in Chislev <WH3691>.
